manifesto.title: Hi, I'm Thiago. And this isn't just another tech blog.
paragraphs: In today's market, writing code is not enough. The most innovative companies need engineers who think like product owners: who understand the why behind the what and know how technical decisions impact business growth.
I created this space to share what I've learned building and scaling digital products, connecting engineering theory with market practice.
